function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Privacy concerns and surveillance societies related to big data analytics","Impact":"Potential erosion of privacy and civil liberties","Mitigation":"Balancing privacy concerns with the potential value of big data analytics through transparency and governance","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving technologies, encryption, anonymization","People":"General public, individuals concerned about privacy","Owner":"Governments, policymakers, tech companies"},{"Description":"Inability of urban big data to capture underlying cause-effect relationships","Impact":"Limitations in truly understanding the root causes of behavior change","Mitigation":"Integration of new forms of quantitative data with analysis of behavior change root causes","Technologies":"Advanced data analytics, machine learning algorithms","People":"Urban planners, data analysts, researchers","Owner":"City governments, research institutions, data analytics organizations"},{"Description":"Need for understanding human behavior at individual and collective levels","Impact":"Risk of overlooking critical factors influencing behavior change","Mitigation":"In-depth study and analysis of human behavior at both individual and collective levels","Technologies":"Social network analysis, behavioral economics frameworks, qualitative research methods","People":"Behavioral scientists, social researchers, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, social research organizations"}]}
